id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.



*See also: [Ethernet Component](https://esphome.io/components/ethernet.html#configuration-variables)*

type.docs:
**string**: The type of LAN chipset. Must be one of `LAN8720` or `TLK110` (see datasheet for more details).



*See also: [Ethernet Component](https://esphome.io/components/ethernet.html#configuration-variables)*

mdc_pin.docs:
**[Pin](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin)**: The MDC pin of the board. Usually this is `GPIO23`.



*See also: [Ethernet Component](https://esphome.io/components/ethernet.html#configuration-variables)*

mdio_pin.docs:
**[Pin](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin)**: The MDIO pin of the board. Usually this is `GPIO18`.



*See also: [Ethernet Component](https://esphome.io/components/ethernet.html#configuration-variables)*

clk_mode.docs:
**string**: The clock mode of the data lines, this must be one of these values: (see datasheet of your board for more details)
  * `GPIO0_IN` (Default) - External clock
  
  * `GPIO0_OUT` - Internal clock
  
  * `GPIO16_OUT` - Internal clock
  
  * `GPIO17_OUT` - Internal clock
  
  



*See also: [Ethernet Component](https://esphome.io/components/ethernet.html#configuration-variables)*

phy_addr.docs:
**int**: The PHY addr type of the ethernet controller. Defaults to 0.



*See also: [Ethernet Component](https://esphome.io/components/ethernet.html#configuration-variables)*

power_pin.docs:
**[Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The pin with which to control the power of the board. Leave unspecified for no power pin (default)



*See also: [Ethernet Component](https://esphome.io/components/ethernet.html#configuration-variables)*

static_ip.docs:
**IPv4 address**: The static IP of your node.



*See also: [Ethernet Component](https://esphome.io/components/ethernet.html#configuration-variables)*

gateway.docs:
**IPv4 address**: The gateway of the local network.



*See also: [Ethernet Component](https://esphome.io/components/ethernet.html#configuration-variables)*

subnet.docs:
**IPv4 address**: The subnet of the local network.



*See also: [Ethernet Component](https://esphome.io/components/ethernet.html#configuration-variables)*

dns1.docs:
**IPv4 address**: The main DNS server to use.



*See also: [Ethernet Component](https://esphome.io/components/ethernet.html#configuration-variables)*

dns2.docs:
**IPv4 address**: The backup DNS server to use.



*See also: [Ethernet Component](https://esphome.io/components/ethernet.html#configuration-variables)*

manual_ip.docs:
Manually configure the static IP of the node.
  * **static_ip** (**Required**, IPv4 address): The static IP of your node.
  
  * **gateway** (**Required**, IPv4 address): The gateway of the local network.
  
  * **subnet** (**Required**, IPv4 address): The subnet of the local network.
  
  * **dns1** (*Optional*, IPv4 address): The main DNS server to use.
  
  * **dns2** (*Optional*, IPv4 address): The backup DNS server to use.
  
  



*See also: [Ethernet Component](https://esphome.io/components/ethernet.html#configuration-variables)*

domain.docs:
**string**: Set the domain of the node hostname used for uploading. For example, if it’s set to `.local`, all uploads will be sent to `<HOSTNAME>.local`. Defaults to `.local`.



*See also: [Ethernet Component](https://esphome.io/components/ethernet.html#configuration-variables)*

use_address.docs:
**string**: Manually override what address to use to connect to the ESP. Defaults to auto-generated value. For example, if you have changed your static IP and want to flash OTA to the previously configured IP address.



*See also: [Ethernet Component](https://esphome.io/components/ethernet.html#configuration-variables)*
